title: 08/13/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 08/13/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by NBCS Boston Patriots Insider Tom E. Curran, who explains how Mac Jones is making a case to be the Week 1 starter in New England. Former NBA All-Star Jermaine O'Neal calls in to discuss Netflix's Malice at the Palace documentary. Tony Hawks discusses what it was like to witness Skateboarding in the Olympics. And actor Frank Whaley shares a story from the set of "Field of Dreams" in which he thought he was going to be fired.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by NBCS Boston Patriots Insider Tom E. Curran, who explains how Mac Jones is making a case to be the Week 1 starter in New England. Former NBA All-Star Jermaine O'Neal calls in to discuss Netflix's Malice at the Palace documentary. Tony Hawks discusses what it was like to witness Skateboarding in the Olympics. And actor Frank Whaley shares a story from the set of "Field of Dreams" in which he thought he was going to be fired.
